data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: Living an unconventional lifestyle in my culture is not easy. This is because of the collectivism that my culture entails. The unconventional lifestyle as indicated by its name is a life not bound by what is usual or the way most people do things. If most people sleep on beds, you can do the same. Or you may decide to try sleeping on the floor. It’s up to you. Or if you usually eat steak with a fork and knife, you can keep doing the same. Or you can try eating it with your hands one time. It’s up to you. Therefore, such way of life is impossible in a collectivist society.
data.referenceText: Is it easy to live an unconventional lifestyle in your culture, give reasons to support your answer?
data.referenceTranslate: 在你的文化中，特立独行的生活方式容易吗?请给出理由来支持你的答案。
